name: Mr.Filton Deluxe
description:
THIS IS THE UPDATED GAME
Here you will play the LD50th build!

Mr.Filton it's the best drawing software for kids ever made! He can connect with the user and play with you as long as he wants.. You'll find that he doesn't just exist in the program, but that he's a sentient living AI!

Delay your soul destruction in this KidPix's environment survival game!

FOR THE LUDUM DARE 50th
